title: Trumpism Is Here to Stay
itunes:title: Trumpism Is Here to Stay
description:
Bloomberg's Josh Green writes that the fate of Trumpism is here to stay, regardless of who wins the White House.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
